scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "postcss src/css/tailwind.css -o src/build/tailwind.css --watch" "postcss src/css/custom.css -o src/build/custom.css --watch"  "live-server ./src"
scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development postcss "postcss src/css/tailwind.css -o src/build/tailwind.css" "postcss src/css/custom.css -o src/build/custom.css"
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production "postcss src/css/tailwind.css -o src/build/tailwind.css" "postcss src/css/custom.css -o src/build/custom.css"
